pwnthem0le

Home Blog About GitHub

pwnthem0le is a Turin-based, hacking students group born out of CyberChallenge 2018. Read more about us and how to join us!

Join Us

There are two simple requirements to join us: the first one is to live in Turin’s area (so that you can come to our meetings), and the second one is to do one of the followings:

  • Participate in CyberChallenge IT 2019 at Politecnico di Torino
  • Solve one (or more) of our challenges, send us the writeup at cHdudGhlbTBsZUBnbWFpbC5jb20= and come to meet us at Politecnico di Torino

Challenges

The challenges will be available soon.
